response.overview: When five 'ordinary' women who haven't run in years decide to take on the New York Marathon, they run head first into the challenge of conquering personal self-doubt and striving for the seemingly unattainable. Along the way they discover unexpected joys, along with the inevitable pain that comes with striving for a goal that at times seems impossible. 'I'm Not a Runner' is an independent documentary, shot entirely on location in South Australia and New York City. Over the course of fifteen months, we follow the physical, emotional and societal barriers these beautifully honest women (aged 35-73) face in their race just to make it to the starting line. As they leave the comfort zone of their lives in Australia and embrace the mayhem of New York City, they discover the power that comes from believing in yourself, not giving in and daring to rewrite your own personal story. This is a film that is real, raw, funny, inspiring and incredibly life affirming.
response.title: I’m Not a Runner
